pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using this package can cause the vectorised program to have worse asymptotic complexity than the original. Use dph-lifted-vseg instead. This package provides the following: nested arrays and the primitive operators that work on them (PA functions); the lifted array combinators that the vectoriser introduces (PP functions); the user facing library functions that work on [::] style arrays (P functions). Deprecated implementation that performs deep copying replicate.
